originalText.text:
Dr Brodman is amazing!
She is an excellent doctor!
She is thorough, patient, kind and and a wonderful listener. She always makes you feel like you’re her top priority as soon as she steps into the room.
I have been a patient of hers for over 20 years, and I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr Brodman and her staff are professional, warm and caring.  Dr Brodman takes the time to listen and answer questions.  She is smart and I feel confident I am good hands.  It is easy to make an appointment.  I highly recommend her and her practice.  .

text.text: Dr Brodman and her staff are professional, warm and caring.  Dr Brodman takes the time to listen and answer questions.  She is smart and I feel confident I am good hands.  It is easy to make an appointment.  I highly recommend her and her practice.  .

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of being under the care of Dr. Brodman, and I must say, she is exceptional. Her approach to patient care is not just professional, but also incredibly warm and caring. Dr. Brodman goes beyond the standard expectations of an OBGYN; she's thorough and genuinely invested in her patients' overall well-being, not just the immediate concerns of the visit.

What stands out the most about Dr. Broadman is her remarkable ability to listen attentively to concerns, ensuring that she addresses each one with detailed explanations and empathy. She takes the time to educate and inform, which speaks volumes about her commitment to patient care.

In all my experiences with healthcare professionals, Dr. Broadman is, without a doubt, the best doctor I've ever had. Her dedication and genuine care have made a significant impact on my health journey. I am truly grateful for her exceptional service and would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled OBGYN.

originalText.text: I've been seeing Dr. Brodman for 30+ years and she has been a core part of my wellness/medical routine for all that time. We often discuss things that feel outside the scope of a gyn exam, but she knows that patients show up as full people -- with home lives, relationships, jobs, all of which affect our bodies. She always follows up immediately and shares creative solutions and solid referrals. Most of all, she makes time to listen -- at a time when most medical appointments are rushed.

text.text: I've been seeing Dr. Brodman for 30+ years and she has been a core part of my wellness/medical routine for all that time. We often discuss things that feel outside the scope of a gyn exam, but she knows that patients show up as full people -- with home lives, relationships, jobs, all of which affect our bodies. She always follows up immediately and shares creative solutions and solid referrals. Most of all, she makes time to listen -- at a time when most medical appointments are rushed.

originalText.text: Dr. Brodman is the best! She really cares about her patients. She takes time to explain procedures and makes sure you are comfortable. In my experience, appointments always start on time with little to no wait. Her front desk and nurses are super friendly and nice. Dr. Brodman is open and transparent about everything which is a stark contrast from my past gyno. So glad I found her and made the switch. Definitely recommend!
